title: CBS pulls ‘60 Minutes’ segment on notorious El Salvador prison
description: The decision, made by editor in chief Bari Weiss, was condemned as "political" by lead correspondent Sharyn Alfonsi.
content: The decision, made by editor in chief Bari Weiss, was condemned as "political" by lead correspondent Sharyn Alfonsi.
